Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi is the player of the match for his figures of 3-22 and a cameo featuring 2 sixes.
Pakistan clinched a three-wicket win over Ireland in their final game of the tournament.
Skipper Babar Azam's steely knock helped Pakistan clinch a thriller against Ireland.
Pakistan found themselves at 57/5 with the Irish bowlers showcasing a spirited fightback.
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam should not be made a scapegoat to hide the system's and team's faults. He is our best player. Burdening him with all the blame and relieving others is not right.
